title: Cuffless, calibration-free hemodynamic monitoring with physics-informed machine learning models
summary: Wearable technologies have the potential to transform ambulatory and at-home hemodynamic monitoring by providing continuous assessments of cardiovascular health metrics and guiding clinical management.
